1: <pb/><t>Nman Dyos,</t> <t>matxi' tz'okta majx b'a'n tuk'i'lju' ttanama lu.</t> <t>matxi' tzaj tanjsa'n jumajtlju'ya ttzalajb'il Jakob';</t>
2: <t>matxi' kub' tnajsa'na tilju' ttanama</t> <t>ex tkyaqilju' kyb'inchb'en myab'a'n;</t>
4: <pb/><t>Nman Dyos ex Klol qeye',</t> <t>¡qo' tkloma ja'lo</t> <t>ex lalun tx'u'jintla qi'je'!</t>
6: <t>¿Ma laytzun tzaj tq'o'n jumajtlju'ya qchwinqlale',</t> <t>tu'ntzun ttzalaju' ttanama ti'ja?</t>
7: <t>Nman Dyos,</t> <t>¡yek'untza tk'u'jlalila qeye', ex qo' tkloma!</t>
8: <pb/><t>Kxe'l nb'i'nwe' ktma' Qman Dyos;</t> <t>qu'n kyolil ti'ju' nak'b'il te ttanam,</t> <t>kyeju' b'a'n okslalqe' te,</t> <t>tu'ntzun lalun kyb'incha jumajtlju' myab'a'n.</t>
9: <t>Axxi'x nqaku' ta'te Dyos,</t> <t>kolol kyi'ju' nche niman te;</t> <t>ktenb'elju' tajwalil twitzju' qtx'otx'.</t>
10: <pb/><t>Kkymujb'a'kyib'ju' tk'u'jlalil exju' ax,</t> <t>kkytz'u'li' kyib'ju' nak'b'il tuk'i'lju' tnik'alilti'j,</t>
11: <t>kpuqilju' ax twitz tx'otx'</t> <t>atzu'n tnik'alilti'j ktzalajel twitz kya'j.</t>
12: <t>Aku'te Qman Dyos ktzajel q'onteju' jb'al,</t> <t>ex ktq'a' tawalju' qtx'otx'.</t>
13: <t>Kb'el neju' tnik'alilti'j twitz,</t> <t>ex kb'el tb'incha'nju' tb'e. Chiju' b'itzal.</t>
